Detailed Description

template<class PATTERN_PROPS, class MINING_PROPS, class ST, template< class, typename, typename, template< typename > class > class CC, template< typename > class ALLOC = std::allocator>
class pattern< PATTERN_PROPS, MINING_PROPS, ST, CC, ALLOC >

The Pattern Class.

Pattern Class takes 4 template arguments. PATTERN_PROPS is the pattern property, MINING_PROPS is the mining property, ST is the pattern storage data structure, CC is the canonical code class.
